content: hi Committers. I've just committed what will be the single biggest change for IG authors that I know of this round of work (for STU3)
any value sets that you have that have an <import> statement, for each import statement, rename it to <valueSet> and wrap it with an <include>.
Do not wrap all the import in a single include - this will turn them into intersections with each other
I have fixed all the value set definitions in svn

The latest value-set schema I just downloaded is not valid:
File C:\Users\Eric\Documents\HL7\FHIR\BUILD_EDIT_FILES\fhir-all-xsd\valueset.xsd is not valid.

here is an example of an offending node

                    <xs:element name="status" type="PublicationStatus" minOccurs="1"     maxOccurs="1">
                        <xs:annotation>
                            <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of this service definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.</xs:documentation>
                        </xs:annotation>
                    </xs:element>
